search.query: index=yang sourcetype=netconf:interfaces "yang_data.oper-status"=down | timechart span=5m count(yang_data.oper-status) by device_name
index=yang sourcetype=netconf:interfaces "yang_data.oper-status"=down |stats count(yang_data.oper-status) as status by yang_data.name
index=yang sourcetype=netconf:interfaces | timechart sum("yang_data.statistics.in-octets") as in_octets by "yang_data.name"
index=yang sourcetype=netconf:interfaces | timechart sum("yang_data.statistics.out-octets") as out_octets by "yang_data.name"

index=yang sourcetype=netconf:interfaces | stats latest("yang_data.statistics.in-errors") as in_errors, latest("yang_data.statistics.out-errors") as out_errors, latest("yang_data.statistics.in-discards") as in_discards, latest("yang_data.statistics.out-discards") as out_discards by "yang_data.name", device_name

index=yang sourcetype=netconf:interfaces | eval total_traffic = 'yang_data.statistics.in-octets' + 'yang_data.statistics.out-octets' | stats latest(total_traffic) as traffic by yang_data.name | sort - traffic | head 10
